column3: The word mammaries refers to the breasts which produce milk, and it can also refer to the mammals, as they are defined by having mammary glands.
column4: Mammaries play a crucial role in the reproductive and nurturing processes of mammals.
column5: The scientist studied the evolutionary adaptations of mammaries across different species of mammals.

column3: The word patience refers to the ability to wait calmly without frustration, and it can also refer to a patient, someone receiving medical care.
column4: The doctor emphasized the importance of patience in helping his patients recover from illness.
column5: After years of practice, my uncle learned that true patience is needed in every patient who struggles with their treatment.

column3: The word matador refers to the bullfighter in a bullfighting event, and it can also be interpreted as matador as a potential play on a door that is disturbed or upset.
column4: The matador gracefully maneuvered around the charging bull during the traditional Spanish festival.
column5: The designer decided to replace the old matador with a modern-style door that captured the essence of traditional Spanish culture.
